document_data.mainbody:
Devout Wasp was a goblin raider and follower of the Absolute that dwelled within the Shattered Sanctum during the late 15 century DR.
Wasp was among the goblins granted the mark of the Absolute.
In the , Wasp and other goblins from the Shattered Sanctum launched a savage raid on the Waukeens Rest inn, which was situated along the Risen Road. They managed to kill many Flaming Fist soldiers and capture some Baldurian nobles, including as Wasp put it, "some duke", all of whom were taken to Moonrise Towers.
